name: Corona Fighter (hansrich2000)
description:
Corona Fighter is a game where the main character has to survive from the viruses outbreak as long as possible in order to reach maximum score.

audio sources : https://freesound.org/

Team : 

1. Hans Richard Alim Natadjaja (Programmer, Leader)

2. Bryant Lee Tjandra (2D Artist)

3. Reiner Anggriawan Jasin (Programmer)

4. Franciscus Valentinus Ongkosianbhadra (Game Designer)

5. Vincent Leonard Santoso (Project Manager, Music)
